mapper.select: SELECT p.*, b.buy_manager new_item_manager, bd.bd_cnt new_item_quantity FROM product p, buying_detail bd, buying b WHERE p.p_itemcode = bd.p_itemcode AND bd.buy_date = b.buy_date AND bd.cust_no = b.cust_no AND p.p_itemcode = #{p_itemcode} AND b.buy_status = 2

SELECT p.*, m.m_manager new_item_manager, md.md_pro_quantity new_item_quantity FROM factory f, product p, make m, make_detail md WHERE f.f_id = p.f_id AND f.f_id = md.f_id AND p.p_itemcode = md.p_itemcode AND m.m_num = md.m_num AND p.p_itemcode = #{p_itemcode} AND md.md_status = 3
